items.sentence: The only ones here who can speak French are Tom and Mary.
It doesn\'t matter whether your answer is right or wrong.
Have you ever visited the office where your father works?
I opened the door and saw two boys standing side by side.
There\'s a possibility that the meeting will be canceled.
If for some reason that should happen, what would you do?
I think that\'s the reason Tom doesn\'t have any friends.
Tom asked Mary to go to the supermarket to get some milk.
Tom asked Mary to help John with his homework assignment.
Tom asked Mary to remind him to call John in the morning.
